list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Big Changes to Customer Front_
Added form to Cart.js to handle user checking out Added hidden input to parse the products purchased Added checkout.js to the API Added Order.js to the models Fixed issue where zipcode box would edit city info Configurated checkout to work with stripe

task.summary:
Big Changes to Customer Front_
Added Read More Section Added Sheen to button that will light up surrounding Changed button to only display SVG but reveal text when hovering Made readmore conditional so that it will show up onclick and dissapear on click(Thinking on changing it to dissapear when user is no longer hovering) Added new exported const to allow the styled components of the ShinyStyledButton to be applied to any other buttons, links etc...

Big Changes to Customer Front_
Added Read More Section Added Sheen to button that will light up surrounding Changed button to only display SVG but reveal text when hovering Made readmore conditional so that it will show up onclick and dissapear on click(Thinking on changing it to dissapear when user is no longer hovering) Added new exported const to allow the styled components of the ShinyStyledButton to be applied to any other buttons, links etc... Implemented const to reduce code redundancy

Big Changes to Customer Front_
Added Read More Section Added Sheen to button that will light up surrounding Changed button to only display SVG but reveal text when hovering Made readmore conditional so that it will show up onclick and dissapear on click(Thinking on changing it to dissapear when user is no longer hovering) Added new exported const to allow the styled components of the ShinyStyledButton to be applied to any other buttons, links etc... Implemented const to reduce code redundancy

Big Changes to Customer Front_
Fixed issue where whitebox and description box would overlay in an obstructive manner Fixed issue where whitebox and description box were not displaying properly Fixed font not rendering properly Fixed issue where hovering over items in the nav bar would expand the links vertically messing up the layout of the components Added a Cart page Added Context to keep track of cart Added logic to prevent cart context from being reset when page is refresh Added logic for cart button on nav bar to show number of items currently in cart

Big Changes to Customer Front_
Added AddSubBtn.js component for specific button styling Added CartBtn.js component for specific button styling Added Table.js component for further styling on cart page Added functions to Cart.js to make add product,remove product and clear cart buttons functional Added feature to keep track and display the total bill accrued Added API component to allow cart to communicate with the database and retrieve relevant info concerning products Added Styled components (Whitebox, LocationInfo,ButtonHolder) to Cart.js to keep page visually consistent Fixed bug where removing all items from cart would not reset the page (last item would still show up) Added new const to keep track of order information Added logic to input component to properly keep track of order information Added form component to allow transfer of data when proceeding to payment

Big Changes to Customer Front_
Added form to Cart.js to handle user checking out Added hidden input to parse the products purchased Added checkout.js to the API Added Order.js to the models Fixed issue where zipcode box would edit city info Configurated checkout to work with stripe
